duties_responsibilities.duty: Directly care for various orthopaedic, pediatric, and neurologic patient populations.
Maximize outcomes for patients through creative, hospitable, evidence-based care.
Create a presence in the community by attending networking events, races, and more to generate new patient referrals.
Participate in a structured Mentorship Program, Clinic Director Training, Orthopaedic Residency Programs, and Pioneer Leadership Program.
Promote the profession of physical therapy within the community and contribute to the growing body of evidence.
Learn the dynamics of the physical therapy profession and how to impact others.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an APTA or CAPTE approved physical therapy program
Basic Life Support Certification via the American Heart Association
